answers.answer: Just be calm. Don't stress!! Stressing will just cause your blood pressure to rise more than it has already. What is your Dr using for induction?
When I was induced they explained well in the hospital. But once they say you can walk and move, do it. The pressure from babies head helps you dilate

If you get the epidural you will be still numb after they stop and your legs will feel like jello but if you feel like you want to walk after everything done have your nurse or hubby help you with the walking cause you will be sore

question: Hey im Ftm with preeclampsia. So they will be inducing me this Friday. I don't know what to expect.Is there any advice or suggestions about being induced you could give.
title: Need suggestion on what to do or not while being induced
